alert.note: Alert for Marion (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 3:19AM CDT until May 26 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wichita KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas... Cottonwood River near Florence affecting Marion County. For the Cottonwood River...including Florence, Cottonwood Falls, Plymouth...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cottonwood River near Florence. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Minor flooding of the left bank and roads along the north bank will begin. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 21.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 22.4 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Cottonwood River Florence 22.0 21.2 Thu 2 AM CDT 14.0 8.6 5.1 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
